title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -Building Fast, Cost-Efficient, Sovereign Inference Platforms on AWS w/Intel CPUs
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在AWS上使用Intel CPU构建快速、经济高效的主权推理平台
abstract: Generative AI is transforming industries—but misconceptions around cost, performance, and infrastructure often slow adoption. In this session, Intel demystifies GenAI deployment on AWS by showcasing real-world use cases how AI practitioners can gain better control of data privacy and lower total costs with open-source alternatives. Learn how Intel’s optimized instances with CPU-first innovations are enabling scalable, cost-effective GenAI inference pipelines on AWS services like SageMaker, and EC2. Whether you're a startup developer or an enterprise architect, discover how Intel is helping customers unlock GenAI’s full potential. This presentation is brought to you by Intel, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 生成式AI正在改变各个行业——但围绕成本、性能和基础设施的误解往往会减缓采用速度。在本次会议中，英特尔通过展示真实用例，揭示了在AWS上部署生成式AI的奥秘，介绍AI从业者如何通过开源替代方案更好地控制数据隐私并降低总成本。了解英特尔优化的实例如何通过CPU优先创新，在AWS服务（如SageMaker和EC2）上实现可扩展、经济高效的生成式AI推理管道。无论您是初创企业开发者还是企业架构师，都可以了解英特尔如何帮助客户释放生成式AI的全部潜力。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴英特尔提供。
